CHAT.comment: Deborah J. Davidson , Angela L. Atkinson Duina

MOT and Chi both work together in making different constructions on the black base magnet and doing pretend play with the magnets. There is little science talk , though at one point they weem to investigate which pieces stick to the black base and which don't , and at another point Mot unsuccessfully tries to show Chi how some magnets repel others (without using the word repel). The mood is lighthearted and playful. Video tape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio tape
